name: Ghastly
description: If Ghastly is in your opening hand, you may reveal it and discard any number ghosts. Draw cards and lose LPs equal the amount revealed.

triggeredEffects.optionMessage: Discard any number of ghosts to draw that many cards and lose that many LPs?
